https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6pXAY3qOaEiML5fV9h6pHsNakr4.jpg In the time of the Tang Dynasty, Yu Xiufeng, a porcelain maker from Mount Meicen, makes a ceramic statue of the Bodhisattva Avalokitesvara to consecrate at Mount Wutai to protect the princeling Li Yi. Avalokitesvara
